platform.util

Interface Input

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Display
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SwingDisplay, Transform, View

    public interface Input
    Provides informations about input, such as time, mouse and keyboard.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getDeltaTime() 
      Button getFocus() 
      Button getKeyboardButton(int code)
      Gets state of specified keyboard button.
      Button getMouseButton(int index)
      Gets state of specified mouse button.
      Vector getMouseLocation() 
      int getMouseScroll() 
      double getTime() 

    • Method Detail

      • getTime

        double getTime()
        Returns:
        time elapsed since the game started, in seconds

      • getDeltaTime

        double getDeltaTime()
        Returns:
        time elapsed since last frame, in seconds

      • getMouseLocation

        Vector getMouseLocation()
        Returns:
        mouse location, in pixels, with origin at lower-left corner

      • getMouseButton

        Button getMouseButton(int index)
        Gets state of specified mouse button.
        Parameters:
        index - valid button identifier (1 - left, 2 - right, 3 - middle)
        Returns:
        button state

      • getMouseScroll

        int getMouseScroll()
        Returns:
        mouse wheel rotation units since last frame (positive is upward)

      • getKeyboardButton

        Button getKeyboardButton(int code)
        Gets state of specified keyboard button.
        Parameters:
        code - valid button identifier
        Returns:
        button state
        See Also:
        KeyEvent

      • getFocus

        Button getFocus()
        Returns:
        window user focus (i.e. down means focused)
